title: Beachfront Luxury Apartments with Sensational Views Over Coolangatta's Kirra Beach
description: Treat the whole family to a laidback beach escape to the sunny Gold Coast with a luxury apartment stay at Nirvana by the Sea - located opposite Kirra Beach in the trendy shopping and dining area of Coolangatta and just 30 minutes from Surfers Paradise, Wet 'n' Wild Gold Coast, Dreamworld, and Warner Bros Movie World. Spend five nights in a spacious self-contained Two-Bedroom Ocean View Apartment and enjoy unlimited movies in the hotel's movie theatre, a late midday checkout and more.

title: Gold Coast Beachfront Family Holiday
description: Treat the whole family to a laidback beach escape to the sunny Gold Coast with a luxury apartment stay at Nirvana by the Sea - located opposite Kirra Beach in the trendy shopping and dining area of Coolangatta and just 30 minutes from Surfers Paradise, Wet 'n' Wild waterpark, Dreamworld, and Warner Bros Movie World. Spend five nights in a spacious self-contained Two-Bedroom Ocean View Apartment and enjoy unlimited movies in the hotel's movie theatre, a late midday checkout and more.

title: Brand New Gold Coast Beachfront Getaway Perfect for Groups and Families
description: A Gold Coast beachfront escape has never looked so appealing. Discover sun-soaked serenity at Iconic Kirra Beach Resort - a brand new resort of luxury apartments perched on the sunny shores of the Gold Coast. This laidback seaside getaway sits a stone's throw from laidback Coolangatta, just 30 minutes from Surfers Paradise and is ideal for groups and families. Enjoy a welcome bottle of wine and chocolates on arrival, guaranteed late 12pm checkout, stunning ocean views and more. Plus three bedroom apartment upgrades available.
offer_address: Intersection of 74 Musgrave Street &, Lord St, Coolangatta QLD 4225

title: Beachside Coolangatta Self-Contained Apartments with Onsite Pool & Spa
description: Escape the hustle and bustle of Surfers Paradise and experience the relaxed coastal allure of Coolangatta with a stay at this beachfront haven, offering a slice of coastal paradise. This collection of Mediterranean-inspired self-contained apartments and villas is located just a short stroll from the pristine sands of Coolangatta Beach, the vibrant dining scene of Marine Parade and the myriad of boutique shops. Back at the hotel, take a dip in the sparkling pool, enjoy cooking a delicious meal al fresco style at the BBQ area or simply relax in your stylishly appointed room.

title: Gold Coast Beachfront Self-Contained Escape on Coolangatta Beach with Pool & Spa
description: Discover the allure of sunny Queensland with a stay along the beautiful Coolangatta Beach. Perfectly positioned on Marine Parade, this beachfront escape is a stone's throw from the world-renowned Snapper Rocks surf break and the vibrant Coolangatta dining precinct. With spacious self-contained studios and apartments, a heated swimming pool, tennis courts and a fully equipped gym, the retreat offers a perfect blend of relaxation and activity.
